text: Opawa is a suburb of Christchurch, New Zealand. Opawa may also refer to: ;Poland * Opawa, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, a village in SW Poland ; New Zealand: * Ōpaoa River, a river through Blenheim ** Opawa River Bridge, a bridge in Blenheim * Little Opawa River, a river in south Canterbury == See also == * Opava, a city in the northern Czech Republic on the river Opava * Opava (disambiguation)
title: Opawa (disambiguation)
